name: Luminite Era: Expedition
description:
Embark on an epic 2D pixel-art adventure in "Luminite Era: Expedition." The world is shrouded in an enigmatic "Black Mist" of unknown origin, but this is no nightmare gradually dissipating; on the contrary, the height of the "Black Mist" continues to rise.

People are forced to gather at the summits of high mountains to evade the encroaching "Black Mist." However, the "Black Mist" is not insurmountable. The mysterious "Luminite" have the power to disperse the darkness, sustaining and expanding the limited living space for humanity.

In this expedition, you will lead the protagonist and a band of adventurers, journeying through lands veiled in the "Black Mist," searching for scarce "Luminite" or unveiling the truth behind the enigmatic mist. However, as time passes, the height of the mist relentlessly ascends, intensifying the urgency of the quest for "Luminite."

Game Features


1. Rich and Unique Boss Battles
With 6 captivating Boss battles in the Demo version alone, the full game will offer an abundance of Boss encounters, ensuring you experience the thrill of combat to the fullest.


2. Diverse Types of Monsters
Dozens of different types of monsters are scattered throughout various regions, avoiding artificially increasing difficulty through overwhelming numbers or health. Each encounter will be a unique challenge.

3. Mysterious and Unpredictable Spell System
The effects of spells depend on the arcane crystals of different attribute energies equipped during casting. Unlock various mysterious spells and experience endless possibilities in combat.

4. Varied Equipment Combinations
With dozens of different equipment pieces, each possessing unique effects, strategic combinations allow you to explore different areas or defeat various Bosses.

5. Complete, Detailed, and World-building Quests
The game features multiple side storylines and quests. Through various NPCs and meticulously crafted narratives, it presents the rich background story of the game world.

6. Harmonious and Exquisite Pixel Art Style
Despite utilizing assets from various stores, the developer has put considerable effort into making the art style appear as harmonious and unified as possible. The game offers visually pleasing and consistent pixel art graphics.


*Since this game was developed by a single person, if you encounter any bugs or errors in translation, please feel free to provide feedback through various channels!
*Due to limited energy, the translation work for some languages is still ongoing, please look forward to it!
